headline.print_headline: NFL's Rice Publicly Apologizes to Wife for Violent Incident
headline.main: NFL's Rice Publicly Apologizes to Wife for Violent Incident

lead_paragraph: Baltimore Ravens Pro Bowl running back Ray Rice, who has been suspended by the National Football League without pay for the first two games of the 2014 season for hitting his wife, apologized to her on Thursday and vowed to speak out against domestic violence.
